## Runtime.IResourceManager interface

Interface defining the read-only properties that the runtime resource resolver needs from a resource manager. This abstraction allows the runtime to work with different implementations without requiring the full ResourceManagerBuilder build mechanics.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IResourceManager<TR extends IResource = IResource> 
```

[builtResources](./ts-res.runtime.iresourcemanager.builtresources.md)


</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

Collections.IReadOnlyValidatingResultMap&lt;[ResourceId](./ts-res.resourceid.md)<!-- -->, TR&gt;


</td><td>

A read-only result map of all built resources, keyed by resource ID. Resources are built on-demand when accessed and returns Results for error handling.


</td></tr>
